item1.title: Question 1.1
item1.firstLine: The program “Module3_2.1” simulates the motion of an object launched upward with a speed of 10 m/s starting at a height of 1 meter above the ground.
item1.secondLine: i. Use the simulation from Module3_2.1 (modifying the code if needed) to determine the height above the ground at which the ball changes from moving upward to moving downward.
item1.thirdLine: Height above the ground at which ball changes directions:
item1.fourthLine: ii. Use the simulation from Module3_2.1 (modifying the code if needed) to estimate the minimum upward speed an object would have to be launched from a height of 1 meter to reach a height of 8.5 meters.
